mapper.select: SELECT C.SBJECT_NM, C.SBJECT_PNT, A.LCTRE_KND, A.LCTRE_SE, E.MBER_NM FROM ESTBL_COURS A, ATNLC_LCTRE B, SBJECT C, PROFSR D, MBER E WHERE A.ESTBL_COURS_CD = B.ESTBL_COURS_CD AND A.SBJECT_CD = C.SBJECT_CD AND D.MBER_NO = A.MBER_NO AND D.MBER_NO = E.MBER_NO AND B.MBER_NO = #{mberNo}

SELECT A.LCTRUM_RESVE_USE_DE, A.LCTRUM_RESVE_USE_PD, E.SBJECT_NM FROM LCTRUM_RESVE A, LCTRUM B, ESTBL_COURS C, ATNLC_LCTRE D, SBJECT E WHERE A.LCTRUM_CD = B.LCTRUM_CD AND B.LCTRUM_CD = C.LCTRUM_CD AND C.ESTBL_COURS_CD = D.ESTBL_COURS_CD AND E.SBJECT_CD = C.SBJECT_CD AND D.MBER_NO = #{mberNo}
